roleset.name: intentional climber
roleset.note: CLIMB-V NOTES: Roleset based on survey of initial sentences of big corpus and comparison with 'rise.' True: 'clamber' is the same verb as 'climb' (from climb.01-v)
CLIMB-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb entry climb.01, OntoNotes grouping climb-n senses 2& 3; maps to VerbNet classes escape-51.1 & run-51.3.2. Framed by Claire. (from climb.01-n)

example.name: with PP
example.text: The four lawyers climbed out from under a table.

example.name: All arguments
example.text: Their climb up the north face took nine hours.

example.name: All argument + MNR, metaphorical climb
example.text: His slow climb out of poverty took years.

example.name: Arg0, 1
example.text: His climbing Mount Meeker was interrupted by a freak snow storm.

roleset.name: non-intentional climber; cf rise
roleset.note: CLIMB-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb entry climb.02, OntoNotes grouping climb-n sense 4; maps to VN classes calibratable_cos-45.6-1& meander-47.7. Framed by Claire. (from climb.02-n)

roles.note: For usage of other arguments refer to "rise" frameset. (from climb.02-v)

role.descr: attribute, when attribute of item is climbing rather than the whole

example.name: stocks, natch
example.text: Share prices of many of these funds this year have climbed much more sharply than the foreign stocks.
example.arg: Share prices of many of these funds
much more sharply than the foreign stocks.

example.name: with start and end points
example.text: The mark climbed to 77.70 yen from 77.65 yen late Tuesday in New York.

example.name: NP only, Args 1 & 4
example.text: its steady climb back to health

example.name: NP only, Arg1
example.text: the climb in oil prices last month
Oil's sudden climb in price halted summer travel plans for many.

example.name: Arg 1 as "in" PP
example.text: There are several causes for the recent climb in traffic fatalities.

example.name: Args 1, 3 & 4
example.text: The "LC," as the company was popularly known, began its climb from modest ranch to cattle empire, and its holdings at the turn of the century stretched from Silver City west to Arizona and from Mule Creek south to Animas - more, it was said, than five hundred thousand acres.

example.name: with end point
example.text: The events leading to the Dow's climbing over 8000 today can be properly called the Mark-to-Market Relief Rally.
